task.name: behaviors.tasks.GoGetDecontaminated
task.description: To be decontaminated through a decontamination site. The agent moves to decontamination site, and when it is reached, ask for decontamination. Once agent is decontaminated, it moves to a given garage position.

parameter.name: decontaminationPlot
parameter.description: The decontamination site to use. Efficiency (delays) of decontaminatin depends on units that are operating the decontamination site.

parameter.name: garagePosition
parameter.description: The position to reach once decontamination is over.

stage.label: move to decontamination plot
stage.description: Move to decontamination site and ask to be decontaminated.

stage.label: move to garage position
stage.description: Decontamination is over, move to garage position.
